vernac_cmds: Hint Rewrite concat_app map_app map_map : list.
Lemma nil_app_nil X (A : list X) : A = [] ++ A ++ [].
Definition gamma (A : SRS) := map (fun '(x,y) => (x, rev y)) A.
Lemma sigma_eq s A : sigma s A = tau1 A ++ [s] ++ rev (tau2 (gamma A)).
Lemma tau2_gamma s A : s el rev (tau2 (gamma A)) <-> s el tau2 A.
Lemma sigma_inv A s1 s x y : sigma s1 A = x ++ [s] ++ y -> ~ s el x -> ~ s el y -> ~ s el sym A -> s1 = s.
assert (s el tau1 A ++ s1 :: rev (tau2 (gamma A))) by (rewrite H; eauto).
eapply in_app_iff in H3 as [ | [ | ? % tau2_gamma]]; try firstorder using tau1_sym, tau2_sym.
Lemma sigma_snoc A x y u v s s' : sigma s A = x ++ [s] ++ y -> ~ s el x -> ~ s el y -> sigma s' (A ++ [u/v]) = x ++ u ++ s' ++ v ++ y.
eapply list_prefix_inv in H as [-> <-]; eauto.
eapply (f_equal (fun a => count a s)) in H.
Definition rule : Type := sig * list sig.
Definition cfg : Type := sig * list rule.
Inductive rew_cfg : cfg -> list sig -> list sig -> Prop:= |rewR R x a y v : (a,v) el rules R -> rew_cfg R (x++[a]++y) (x++v++y).
Lemma rewrite_sing R a x : (a, x) el rules R -> rew_cfg R [a] x.
Inductive rewt (S: cfg) (x: list sig) : list sig -> Prop := |rewtRefl : rewt S x x |rewtRule y z : rewt S x y -> rew_cfg S y z -> rewt S x z.
Global Instance rewtTrans R : PreOrder (rewt R).
Global Instance rewrite_proper R : Proper (rewt R ==> rewt R ==> rewt R) (@app sig).
intros x1 y1 H1 x2 y2 H2.
replace (x1 ++ x ++ [a] ++ y0) with ( (x1 ++ x) ++ [a] ++ y0) by now autorewrite with list.
replace (x1 ++ x ++ v ++ y0) with ( (x1 ++ x) ++ v ++ y0) by now autorewrite with list.
Global Instance subrel R : subrelation (rew_cfg R) (rewt R).
Definition terminal G x := ~ exists y, rew_cfg G x y.
Lemma terminal_iff G x : terminal G x <-> forall s y, s el x -> ~ (s, y) el rules G.
intros H s y A B.
Definition L (G : cfg) x := rewt G [startsym G] x /\ terminal G x.
Definition sym_G (G : cfg) := startsym G :: flat_map (fun '(a, x) => a :: x) (rules G).
Lemma sym_G_rewt x G y : x <<= sym_G G -> rewt G x y -> y <<= sym_G G.
Definition CFP' (G : cfg) := exists x, L G x /\ x = List.rev x.
Definition CFI' '(G1, G2) := exists x, L G1 x /\ L G2 x.
Definition G := (S, (S,[S]) :: map (fun '(u / v) => (S, u ++ [S] ++ v)) R ++ map (fun '(u / v) => (S, u ++ [a] ++ v)) R).
Lemma terminal_iff_G y : terminal G y <-> ~ S el y.
enough ((exists y0, rew_cfg G y y0) <-> S el y).
destruct H0 as [ | [ [[] []] % in_map_iff | [[] []] % in_map_iff ] % in_app_iff]; inv H; eauto.
Lemma rewt_count x : rewt G [S] x -> count x S <= 1.
destruct H1 as [ | [ [[] []] % in_map_iff | [[] []] % in_map_iff ] % in_app_iff]; inv H0.
edestruct fresh_spec with (l := Sigma); try reflexivity.
Lemma Post_CFG_1' A : A <<= R -> A = [] \/ rewt G [S] (sigma a A).
Lemma Post_CFG_2 x : rewt G [S] x -> exists A m, A <<= R /\ sigma m A = x /\ (m = S \/ m = a /\ A <> []).
destruct H1 as [ | [(? & ? & ?) % in_map_iff | (? & ? & ?) % in_map_iff] % in_app_iff]; inv H0.
destruct IHrewt as (A & m & HA & IHA & Hm).
edestruct fresh_spec with (l := sym R ++ [a]); try reflexivity.
destruct IHrewt as (A & m & HA & IHA & Hm).
edestruct fresh_spec with (l := sym R ++ [a]); try reflexivity.
Lemma reduction_full x : (exists A, A <<= R /\ A <> [] /\ sigma a A = x) <-> L G x.
edestruct fresh_spec with (l := sym R ++ [a]); try reflexivity.
eapply in_app_iff in E as [ | [ | ? % tau2_gamma ] % in_app_iff].
intros [(A & m & HA & HE & Hm) % Post_CFG_2 ?].
Definition Post_G '(R, a, x) := exists A, A <<= R /\ A <> [] /\ sigma a A = x.
Definition CFG '(G, x) := L G x.
exists (fun '(R, a, x) => (G R a, x)).
destruct H as (A & HR & HA & H).
eapply reduction_full in Hx as (A & HR & HA & H1).
exists (fun '(R1, R2, a) => (G R1 a, G R2 a)).
destruct H as (A1 & A2 & HR1 & HR2 & HA1 & HA2 & H).
eapply reduction_full in HR1 as (A1 & HR1 & HA1 & H1).
eapply reduction_full in HR2 as (A2 & HR2 & HA2 & H2).

command: assert (s el tau1 A ++ s1 :: rev (tau2 (gamma A))) by (rewrite H; eauto).
eapply in_app_iff in H3 as [ | [ | ? % tau2_gamma]]; try firstorder using tau1_sym, tau2_sym.
eapply list_prefix_inv in H as [-> <-]; eauto.
eapply (f_equal (fun a => count a s)) in H.
intros H s y A B.
enough ((exists y0, rew_cfg G y y0) <-> S el y).
destruct H0 as [ | [ [[] []] % in_map_iff | [[] []] % in_map_iff ] % in_app_iff]; inv H; eauto.
destruct H1 as [ | [ [[] []] % in_map_iff | [[] []] % in_map_iff ] % in_app_iff]; inv H0.
edestruct fresh_spec with (l := Sigma); try reflexivity.
edestruct fresh_spec with (l := sym R ++ [a]); try reflexivity.
eapply in_app_iff in E as [ | [ | ? % tau2_gamma ] % in_app_iff].
intros [(A & m & HA & HE & Hm) % Post_CFG_2 ?].
exists (fun '(R, a, x) => (G R a, x)).
destruct H as (A & HR & HA & H).
eapply reduction_full in Hx as (A & HR & HA & H1).
exists (fun '(R1, R2, a) => (G R1 a, G R2 a)).
destruct H as (A1 & A2 & HR1 & HR2 & HA1 & HA2 & H).
eapply reduction_full in HR1 as (A1 & HR1 & HA1 & H1).
eapply reduction_full in HR2 as (A2 & HR2 & HA2 & H2).
